headline: Here’s Why NZS Capital Added Roper Technologies (ROP) to its Portfolio
summary: NZS Capital, LLC, an investment management company, released its “NZS Growth Strategy” third quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The strategy returned 3.97% (gross) and 4.13% (net) in the quarter, compared to 6.56% for the Morningstar Global Target Market Exposure (NR) index and 4.53% for the Morningstar Global Growth […]
